title: Mango and passion fruit cheesecake
ingredients: ['200g digestive biscuits', '45g unsalted butter, melted', '6 leaves gelatine', '600g cream cheese', '200ml whipping cream', '200g caster sugar', '1/2 mango, juice and pulp', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 passion fruits', '1 leaf gelatine', '15g caster sugar', 'sliced strawberries, for decoration (optional)', 'icing sugar for dusting (optional)']
